portsIn.name: Style
Style
Text
portsIn.value:
Lost in a dreamscape is an investigation, a research and a provocation. It is an anti solutionist, anti rationalist, anti materialist take on exclusivity in the context of the data driven infrastructural assembly that we live in today. Inspired from the commonalities of a dream, a maze and a doomscroll, lost in a dreamscape strives to present an experience of a reality void as a community informed dream machine designed to please, provoke and participate in this pedagoical process of reflection and imagination as a choose your own adventure experience, based out of a simple question : what do you dream about?

Participate by filling this form and your dream might materialize sometime somewhere in the dreamscape.
